@graph.name: Easy Homemade Salsa - Fresh Tomato Salsa
@graph.description: Are you ready for this 5 minute Easy Homemade Salsa. This fresh tomato salsa is super quick to make in a blender or a food processor and is always a hit at the party. Vegan, Glutenfree, Soyfree, Nutfree recipe
recipeIngredient: 15 oz can of diced tomatoes ( or 3 ripe medium tomatoes)
1  garlic clove or use 1/4 tsp garlic powder
1/2 tsp salt (less or more depending on salt content of the diced tomato)
Optional add ins: dash of cayenne, chili blend, or chipotle pepper, (1/4 tsp sugar or sweetener)

recipeInstructions.text: Add all the ingredients to a blender or food processor. Pulse a few times (less or more depending on preferred texture).
recipeInstructions.name: Add all the ingredients to a blender or food processor. Pulse a few times (less or more depending on preferred texture).

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adust, salt and flavor and mix in. Add some sweetener if needed
recipeInstructions.name: Taste and adust, salt and flavor and mix in. Add some sweetener if needed

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer to a bowl. Chill for atleast 15 mins to help the flavors meld. Garnish with cilantro, chopped jalapeno, pepper flakes. Serve with warm tortilla chips. Can be stored in an airtight container in the refrigerator for upto 5 days.
